long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever been frustrated while trying to access research papers while off-campus?

After setting up your institution's library URL, LibProxy adds an icon to your menu bar, as well as to the webpage whenever it detects a valid research article.

With just one click, you will be redirected through your institution's library to the unlocked article.
